content: I am a very simple being. I look at it this way today. Tomorrow I may look at it differently. I once and actually still do live with GOD, based on my perception moment to moment. In my desire to individualize I perceived myself as separate from GOD. When I no longer perceive myself as separate, I have perhaps achieved my goal of understanding the meaning of life. As always, thanks for sharing this information Jack. I value your writing very much.
